description: Connect to your Oura Ring data to retrieve sleep, activity, readiness, heart rate, stress, and workout metrics. Analyze recent sleep patterns, summarize activity, and check recovery status with clear, actionable insights. Track trends over time and bring your wellness metrics into your workflows.

accessToken.description: Your Oura Personal Access Token from https://cloud.ouraring.com/personal-access-tokens

capabilities.name: get-personal-info
capabilities.description: Retrieve your personal information from Oura Ring including age, weight, height, and biological sex

capabilities.name: get-daily-sleep
capabilities.description: Retrieve daily sleep data including total sleep time, sleep stages, efficiency, and sleep score

capabilities.name: get-daily-activity
capabilities.description: Retrieve daily activity data including steps, calories, distance, and activity score

capabilities.name: get-daily-readiness
capabilities.description: Retrieve daily readiness data including readiness score, temperature deviation, and recovery indicators

capabilities.name: get-heart-rate
capabilities.description: Retrieve heart rate measurements including resting heart rate and heart rate variability

capabilities.name: get-workouts
capabilities.description: Retrieve workout sessions including type, duration, intensity, and calories burned

capabilities.name: get-sleep-sessions
capabilities.description: Retrieve detailed sleep session data including individual sleep periods with stages and metrics

capabilities.name: get-daily-stress
capabilities.description: Retrieve daily stress measurements and recovery indicators
